[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Partially addressable: [0m[1;36m01[0m[39m [0m[1;36m02[0m[39m [0m[1;36m03[0m[39m [0m[1;36m04[0m[39m [0m[1;36m05[0m[39m [0m[1;36m06[0m[39m [0m[1;36m07[0m[39m [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Heap left redzone:       fa[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Freed heap region:       fd[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack left redzone:      f1[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack mid redzone:       f2[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack right redzone:     f3[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack after return:      f5[0m                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Poisoned by user:        f7[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Container overflow:      fc[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Array cookie:            ac[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp2hb2kgxu[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer report reveals a heap-buffer-overflow in the function `rx_icmp`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithin `src/mongoose/src/net_builtin.c`. When processing a fuzzed packet, the code [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreads one byte past an allocated [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer. The overflow is triggered by a [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msingle-byte read at offset [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m, immediately beyond the end of the region allocated [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the fuzzer’s harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Issue: During fuzz testing [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`fuzz`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, AddressSanitizer reports a one-byte [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m. The [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode reads from address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, which lies exactly one byte past a [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap allocation.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Vulnerability type: Heap‐based buffer overflow [0m[1;39m([0m[39mout‐of‐bounds read[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Observations:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The overflow occurs inside `rx_icmp`, called from the generic packet‐receive [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpath [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_tcpip_rx`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which in turn is invoked by the fuzzing harness entry point [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The offending read attempts to access data at index [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m of a packet buffer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated with length [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m, indicating missing bounds checks.  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The sanitizer’s shadow-memory snapshot shows the byte at offset [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m is in the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap left redzone [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`fa`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, confirming the read is out of the valid region.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Code areas to inspect for a complete view:[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `rx_icmp` implementation in `src/mongoose/src/net_builtin.c` around line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The packet‐receive dispatcher `mg_tcpip_rx` in the same file [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnear line [0m[1;36m897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The fuzzing harness in `src/mongoose/test/fuzz.c`, especially the allocation [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlogic at the call site of `malloc` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m95[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that constructs `pkt`.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Definitions of the `pkt` structure [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuffer size, payload pointers[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munderstand how packet length is tracked.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Any helper routines in `net_builtin.c` that parse or index into packet data [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore `rx_icmp` is invoked.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m359[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->arp->op == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m398[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_client[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m399[0m[39m:  uint32_t ip = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, gw = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, mask = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, lease = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, dns = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, sntp = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m419[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&lease, p + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mlease[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m422[0m[39m:      msgtype = p[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m424[0m[39m:    p += p[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m425[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m895[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:838[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m846[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m838[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m839[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"IP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m840[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m || pkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m58[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m841[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m842[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m843[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m844[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m845[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m846[0m[39m:    pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Summary of root cause[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The heap-buffer-overflow in `rx_icmp` is caused by an out‐of‐bounds [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.buf` pointer and incorrectly computed `pkt->pay.len` in the IPv4 [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket‐receive path. Specifically, when a malformed IPv4 header advertises an [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInternet Header Length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m, the code calls:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```c[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     without verifying that `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` lies within the actual received packet. As [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39ma result, `pkt->pay.buf` may point past `raw.buf + raw.len`, making the subsequent [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`memcpy` in `rx_icmp` read beyond the allocated buffer.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch location[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - File: `src/net_builtin.c`[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Function: `mg_tcpip_rx`, IPv4 branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround lines [0m[1;36m883[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m895[0m[1;39m)[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Proposed patch steps[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Compute the IHL and the IP header length in bytes:[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```c[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        unsigned ihl = pkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        size_t iphdr_len = ihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Enforce two new validations immediately after confirming the minimal IPv4 [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader:[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - IHL must be at least [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: reject smaller values as invalid.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - The received buffer `pkt.raw.len` must cover the full header: `raw.len >= [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + iphdr_len`.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Only after these checks pass, set the payload pointer via `mkpay`:[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```c[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m malformed IHL[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + iphdr_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m truncated [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + iphdr_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. Remove or replace the existing IHL‐based `if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[33m...[0m[39m` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbranch with the unified, validated code.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification & preservation of functionality[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Valid packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL ≥ [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m and buffer length adequate[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m proceed identically: [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`payload.buf` is set just past the IP header [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwith options if any[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Malformed or truncated packets are quietly dropped at an early stage, [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreventing any out‐of‐bounds access in downstream logic including `rx_icmp`.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No existing tests or fuzz harnesses are modified; their behavior remains [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munchanged for well‐formed packets.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We do not touch the ICMP handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m itself or any fuzzing/harness [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode, preserving the fuzzer entry point and test suite integrity.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Side‐effects and mitigation[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Packets with invalid or truncated IPv4 options are now dropped entirely rather[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthan partially processed. This is consistent with how other truncated‐packet checks[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mare handled in the code [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., before ARP, UDP, TCP paths[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Should any higher‐level logic depend on processing these edge cases, it will [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnow see fewer callbacks for malformed packets—but this is preferable to silent [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmemory corruption.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No impact on IPv6 path: it already validated header size before `mkpay`.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Similar precedents[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The IPv6 receive path [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip6`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m enforces a full‐header length check before [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mkpay` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msee lines [0m[1;36m878[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m881[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Our patch brings IPv4 in line with that robust [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpattern.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/29/25 11:40:00][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=323759;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=507159;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m[12/29/25 11:43:27][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.[1;33mPATCH[0m -> TeamStatus.EVALUATE                    ]8;id=834787;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=476324;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         - Stdout:                                                                            [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [33mFUZZER[0m=[35mfuzz[0m                                                                        [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + shift                                                                              [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m [32m'!'[0m -v TESTCASE [32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                            [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [33mTESTCASE[0m=[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                 [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow in the function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfile `net_builtin.c`, line [0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. A [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch was proposed that changes the IP header length handling in `mg_tcpip_rx` by [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomputing the Internet Header Length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, enforcing a minimum value, checking for[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtruncated headers, and then calling `mkpay` with the computed offset. After [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mapplying this patch, the same heap-buffer-overflow in `rx_icmp` still occurs under [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe fuzzer, indicating that the patch did not eliminate the observed out-of-bounds [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mread.[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdispatch path. Original code:[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     else[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Patched code:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         unsigned ihl = pkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m malformed IHL[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t iphdr_len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + iphdr_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + iphdr_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This patch enforces `ihl >= [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m`, checks that the raw packet length covers the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfull IP header, and then sets the payload pointer accordingly before calling [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_ip`.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Result After Patch  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Running the same fuzzer command yields an identical ASan error:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ERROR: AddressSanitizer: heap-buffer-overflow [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m in rx_icmp[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m is located [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     SUMMARY: AddressSanitizer: heap-buffer-overflow net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m in [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrx_icmp[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The stack trace remains the same and the overflow location is unchanged, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating the patch did not prevent the out-of-bounds access in `rx_icmp`.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Areas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The function `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`net_builtin.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: examine how it indexes into the packet payload and whether there [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mare sufficient length checks before each access.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The packet structure [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m fields after `mkpay` is called: verify that [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt.pay`, `pkt.len`, and related members correctly reflect the remaining buffer [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msize.[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The function `mkpay`: review how it initializes or adjusts the packet’s [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload pointer and length, and whether it accounts for all cases of header sizes.[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The higher-level function `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to ensure [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreconditions hold when invoking `rx_icmp`—for example, protocol checks, header [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidations, or early returns on malformed packets.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m836[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m396[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m392[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Copy RX payload to TX[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:    icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:838[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m846[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m838[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m839[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"IP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m840[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m || pkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m58[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m841[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m842[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m843[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m844[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m845[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m846[0m[39m:    pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Overview of Root Cause  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   The heap-buffer-overflow in `rx_icmp` is triggered because, in the IPv4 [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdemultiplexing function [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the code hard-codes the ICMP header pointer to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, i.e. exactly [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes past the start of the IP [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader. When a minimal-length IP packet [0m[1;39m([0m[33mIHL[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m of exactly [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes is passed [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthrough the patched `mg_tcpip_rx`, the initial payload pointer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->pay.buf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrectly set to `ip + [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m` and `pay.len` is computed as zero. However, the demux [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode still computes `pkt->icmp` as `ip + [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m`, then checks `pay.len < [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[39m < [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and returns early, so `rx_icmp` should not be called. [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe only way `rx_icmp` is invoked is if `pay.len >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, meaning [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthere is at least [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes of payload, but `pkt->icmp` still points to `ip + [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m`. If[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe raw buffer length is exactly [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m or slightly larger [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbut less than the full IP +[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP header + payload[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, reading `pkt->icmp->type` will index past the buffer end.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   In short, although `mg_tcpip_rx` was patched to enforce IHL and header-length [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks before setting `pkt->pay`, the *demux* [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m still assumes a fixed [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m20[0m[39m-byte IPv4 header and never revalidates against IHL or uses the already-computed [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.buf`. Consequently, `pkt->icmp` can point off the end of the buffer and [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbe dereferenced in `rx_icmp`.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patching Strategy  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Preserve and reapply the previous IHL‐based patch in `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mas given [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the last attempt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to ensure that:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - We enforce `ihl >= [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m`.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - We check `pkt.raw.len >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + iphdr_len` before calling `mkpay`.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - We call `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + iphdr_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` exactly once to position [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.buf` at the start of the transport header [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP/UDP/TCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. **Modify the IPv4 demux logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to use `pkt->pay.buf` rather than [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`** when setting protocol-header pointers**.** This entails:[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. In the ICMP branch, replace  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         with  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->pay.buf;  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         Then perform the size check [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, call `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->pay.buf + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`, and invoke [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp`.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. In the UDP branch, replace  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         with  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->pay.buf;  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         Leave the subsequent size check, `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, and UDP handlers untouched.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. In the TCP branch, replace  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         with  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->pay.buf;  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         Then keep the existing length check, `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->tcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`, and [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moffset calculation. Optionally, to handle TCP options fully, one could also advance[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe payload pointer by `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->off >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * 4U` instead of just [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, but that is orthogonal to the current overflow.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. [0m[1;39m([0m[39mOptional[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Mirror the same approach in the IPv6 demux [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip6`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: use [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.buf` rather than `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. Although the IPv6 header is always [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfixed [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes, using `pay.buf` makes the code more consistent and immune to any [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuture changes.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Why This Fix Works  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By centralizing the IP-header length logic in `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhere IHL is [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecked and the packet is truncated accordingly[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and then having *all* subsequent [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocol demultiplexers rely solely on the already-computed `pkt->pay` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpointer + [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, we:[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Guarantee that `pkt->icmp`, `pkt->udp`, and `pkt->tcp` always point within [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe legitimate buffer region.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Avoid any mismatch between “where we think transport headers start” and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m“where `pkt->pay.buf` actually is.”  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We do *not* modify any harness, fuzzing logic, or external dependencies—only [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcore parsing code in `net_builtin.c`. Existing tests and other protocols remain [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munaltered.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Preservation of Functionality  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - IPv4 packets with no options [0m[1;39m([0m[33mIHL[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m still dispatch exactly as before: [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pay.buf` → `ip + [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m`, and demux through ICMP/UDP/TCP.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - IPv4 packets with options [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL>[0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are already handled by the patch in [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx` to ensure full header coverage and correct `pay.buf`. Now demux uses [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat offset, so ICMP/TCP/UDP will parse correctly after the options.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - IPv6 behavior is unchanged [0m[1;39m([0m[39mand can be similarly hardened if desired[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Potential Side-Effects & Mitigations  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All protocol demuxes now lean on `pkt->pay.buf`. If any future code paths [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbypass the initial `mkpay` in `mg_tcpip_rx`, they must ensure `pkt->pay` is valid. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The change subtly alters where the transport header pointer is taken from; if [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msomeone had relied on `pkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` for IPv4 diagnostics, they must switch to [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.buf`. But no public API is exposed.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Comprehensive regression tests [0m[1;39m([0m[39munit-tests, integration tests, fuzz targets[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshould be run to verify no regressions in UDP/TCP handling.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Implementation Steps  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Reapply the IHL‐based patch in `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines ~[0m[1;36m888[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m895[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, exactly as in [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe last patch attempt.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. In `src/net_builtin.c`, locate `static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` around lines [0m[1;36m800[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m836[0m[39m.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFor each of the three protocol branches:  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Replace the `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` cast with `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Keep the subsequent `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`, `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, and [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_*` calls unchanged.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. [0m[1;39m([0m[39mOptional[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Apply a similar change in `static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at lines [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m~[0m[1;36m838[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m846[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Rebuild and rerun the fuzzer: ensure the ASan heap-buffer-overflow in [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp` no longer occurs.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. Run full test suite to verify UDP, TCP, DHCP, etc., remain functional.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m. Commit changes with a clear description referencing the IHL fix and the demux[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer correction.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis strategy fully addresses the out-of-bounds read by ensuring every [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtransport-layer pointer is derived from the validated `pkt->pay` region, thereby [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreserving existing functionality and fuzzing semantics without touching harness or[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexternal code.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/29/25 11:43:52][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=142283;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=655590;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
