[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue arises from an AddressSanitizer report of a heap-buffer-overflow [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. A specially crafted fuzzer input [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcaused a one‐byte read immediately past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocated buffer.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch was attempted that replaces all protocol‐header pointer arithmetic based on[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`, `pkt->ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`, etc., with references to `pkt->pay.buf` plus the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader size, and also adds explicit checks of IPv4 IHL and overall buffer lengths [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore moving the payload pointer.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying this patch, the same AddressSanitizer error is triggered in [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp` at the identical location, indicating the overflow remains unresolved.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Initial Issue**[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - AddressSanitizer log reports:[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - **Heap-buffer-overflow**: a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, which [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - The overflow occurs in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Call stack:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `rx_icmp`[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `mg_tcpip_rx`[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfuzz harness[0m[1;39m)[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. `fuzzer::Fuzzer::ExecuteCallback`[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. `fuzzer::RunOneTest`[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m. `fuzzer::FuzzerDriver`[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;36m7[0m[39m. `main` in FuzzerMain.cpp  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - The region was allocated in the fuzz harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`malloc` in [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mLLVMFuzzerTestOneInput[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with size [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes, used to construct `pkt.raw.len` [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt.pay.len`.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Patch Attempt**[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In net_builtin.c, all instances of:[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     were changed to:[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->pay.buf;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->pay.buf + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar updates were made for UDP and TCP:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - `pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->pay.buf; [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->pay.buf + [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - `pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->pay.buf; [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->pay.buf + [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - For IPv4 header parsing, the code block:[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     else[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     was replaced by:[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       unsigned ihl = pkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m malformed IHL[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t iphdr_len = ihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + iphdr_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + iphdr_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The intention was to use the dynamic payload buffer and validate header [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlengths; no changes were made to `rx_icmp` itself.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Result of Patch**[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After rebuilding and rerunning the fuzzer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`-[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, AddressSanitizer [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreports the **same** heap-buffer-overflow in `rx_icmp` at net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The faulting address, buffer bounds, and call stack are identical to the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minitial failure, showing that the overflow persists despite the pointer [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madjustments.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Areas for Further Investigation**[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **rx_icmp [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.c around line [0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     Examine how `pkt->pay.len` and `pkt->pay.buf` are set immediately before [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minvoking `rx_icmp`. Verify that the buffer passed to `rx_icmp` is correctly sized [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand null‐terminated, and that all ICMP fields accessed inside `rx_icmp` are guarded[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mby length checks.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **mkpay function and payload adjustments**  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     Ensure that `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, ptr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` reliably updates `pkt->pay.buf` and [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.len` based on the new `ptr`, and that no off‐by‐one errors remain when [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomputing the new payload start.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **pkt structure and raw buffer allocation**  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     Review the definition of `struct pkt` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mparticularly `raw.buf`, `raw.len`, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pay.buf`, `pay.len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and how the fuzz harness populates `raw` before parsing. [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mConfirm that `raw.len` truly reflects the allocated size, and that no code [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverwrites or miscalculates `pay.len`.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **IPv4 vs. IPv6 header parsing paths**  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     The bug was triggered under IPv4 [0m[1;39m([0m[33mproto[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. It may help to audit similar logic[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the IPv6 branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip6`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to spot analogous offset miscalculations.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Interplay with fuzz harness**  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     While the harness is not the root cause, cross‐checking how the fuzzer [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconstructs `pkt.raw.buf` and the minimal valid packet constraints could reveal [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mscenarios leading to too‐small buffers being passed into protocol handlers.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNo speculative root cause or fix is provided here; the focus is on documenting [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mobservable facts, patch changes, and code areas requiring deeper review.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m155[0m[39m:  size_t i;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m156[0m[39m:  const uint8_t *p = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst uint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m157[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < len; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m sum += i & [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m ? p[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m : [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[1;39m)[0m[39m << [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m158[0m[39m:  return sum;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m159[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m160[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m161[0m[39m:static uint16_t [0m[1;35mcsumfin[0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t sum[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m162[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39msum >> [0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m sum = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msum & [0m[1;36m0xffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[39msum >> [0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m163[0m[39m:  return [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[39m~sum & [0m[1;36m0xffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m164[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m165[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m166[0m[39m:static uint16_t [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst void *buf, size_t len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m167[0m[39m:  uint32_t sum = [0m[1;35mcsumup[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, buf, len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m168[0m[39m:  return [0m[1;35mcsumfin[0m[1;39m([0m[39msum[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m169[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m170[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m171[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35msettmout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_connection *c, uint8_t type[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m172[0m[39m:  struct mg_tcpip_if *ifp = c->mgr->ifp;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m173[0m[39m:  struct connstate *s = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct connstate *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m174[0m[39m:  unsigned n = type == MIP_TTYPE_ACK   ? MIP_TCP_ACK_MS[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m175[0m[39m:               : type == MIP_TTYPE_ARP ? MIP_ARP_RESP_MS[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m176[0m[39m:               : type == MIP_TTYPE_SYN ? MIP_TCP_SYN_MS[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m177[0m[39m:               : type == MIP_TTYPE_FIN ? MIP_TCP_FIN_MS[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m178[0m[39m:                                       : MIP_TCP_KEEPALIVE_MS;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m179[0m[39m:  s->timer = ifp->now + n;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m180[0m[39m:  s->ttype = type;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m181[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"%lu %d -> %llx"[0m[39m, c->id, type, s->timer[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m182[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m183[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m184[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, size_t len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m185[0m[39m:  size_t n = ifp->driver->[0m[1;35mtx[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->tx.buf, len, ifp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m186[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn == len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ifp->nsent++;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m187[0m[39m:  return n;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m188[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m189[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m190[0m[39m:void [0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_arp_request[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, uint32_t ip, uint8_t *mac[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m191[0m[39m:  struct eth *eth = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ifp->tx.buf;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m192[0m[39m:  struct arp *arp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct arp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39meth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m193[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth->dst, [0m[1;36m255[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth->dst[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m194[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth->src, ifp->mac, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth->src[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m195[0m[39m:  eth->type = [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x806[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m196[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39marp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m197[0m[39m:  arp->fmt = [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, arp->pro = [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, arp->hlen = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m,[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m198[0m[39m:  arp->plen = [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m199[0m[39m:  arp->op = [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, arp->tpa = ip, arp->spa = ifp->ip;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m200[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39marp->sha, ifp->mac, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39marp->sha[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m24[0m[39m:#endif[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m27[0m[39m:static int [0m[1;35mmg_base64_encode_single[0m[1;39m([0m[39mint c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m28[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc < [0m[1;36m26[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m29[0m[39m:    return c + [0m[32m'A'[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m30[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc < [0m[1;36m52[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m31[0m[39m:    return c - [0m[1;36m26[0m[39m + [0m[32m'a'[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m32[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc < [0m[1;36m62[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:    return c - [0m[1;36m52[0m[39m + [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m:    return c == [0m[1;36m62[0m[39m ? [0m[32m'+'[0m[39m : [0m[32m'/'[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m:static int [0m[1;35mmg_base64_decode_single[0m[1;39m([0m[39mint c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc >= [0m[32m'A'[0m[39m && c <= [0m[32m'Z'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:    return c - [0m[32m'A'[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc >= [0m[32m'a'[0m[39m && c <= [0m[32m'z'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:    return c + [0m[1;36m26[0m[39m - [0m[32m'a'[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc >= [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m && c <= [0m[32m'9'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m:    return c + [0m[1;36m52[0m[39m - [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'+'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m47[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;36m62[0m[39m;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'/'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;36m63[0m[39m;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'='[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m:    return [0m[1;36m64[0m[39m;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m226[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlen < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*h[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;                [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Too small, headers dont fit[0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m908[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexpired_1000ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m909[0m[39m:#if MG_ENABLE_TCPIP_PRINT_DEBUG_STATS[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m910[0m[39m:    const char *names[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m{[0m[32m"down"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"up"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"req"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"ip"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"ready"[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m911[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_INFO[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Status: %s, IP: %M, rx:%u, tx:%u, dr:%u, er:%u"[0m[39m,[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m912[0m[39m:             names[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mifp->state[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &ifp->ip, ifp->nrecv, ifp->nsent,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m913[0m[39m:             ifp->ndrop, ifp->nerr[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m914[0m[39m:#endif[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m915[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m916[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle gw ARP request timeout, order is important[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m917[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexpired_1000ms && ifp->state == MG_TCPIP_STATE_IP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m918[0m[39m:    ifp->state = MG_TCPIP_STATE_READY;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m keep best-effort MAC[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m919[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35monstatechange[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m920[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmongoose.h:[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m200[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m:#define MG_ARCH_ARMCGT [0m[1;36m15[0m[39m       [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Texas Semi ARM-CGT[0m                            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:  uint16_t eport;               [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Next ephemeral port[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:  volatile uint32_t ndrop;      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Number of received, but dropped frames[0m        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m701[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[32m""[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m703[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mio->size - io->len < pkt->pay.len &&[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m704[0m[39m:             ![0m[1;35mmg_iobuf_resize[0m[1;39m([0m[39mio, io->len + pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m705[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"oom"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m706[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m707[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Copy TCP payload into the IO buffer. If the connection is plain text,[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m708[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m we copy to c->recv. If the connection is TLS, this data is encrypted,[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m709[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m therefore we copy that encrypted data to the c->rtls iobuffer instead,[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m710[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m and then call [0m[1;35mmg_tls_recv[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to decrypt it. NOTE: [0m[1;35mmg_tls_recv[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m will[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m711[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m call back [0m[1;35mmg_io_recv[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m which grabs raw data from c->rtls[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m712[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&io->buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mio->len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m713[0m[39m:    io->len += pkt->pay.len;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m714[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m715[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"%lu SEQ %x -> %x"[0m[39m, c->id, [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, s->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m716[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Advance ACK counter[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m717[0m[39m:    s->ack = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m718[0m[39m:    s->unacked += pkt->pay.len;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m719[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m size_t diff = s->acked <= s->ack ? s->ack - s->acked : s->ack;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m720[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->unacked > MIP_TCP_WIN [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m && s->acked != s->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m721[0m[39m:      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Send ACK immediately[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m722[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"%lu imm ACK %lu"[0m[39m, c->id, s->acked[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m723[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mtx_tcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->mgr->ifp, s->mac, rem_ip, TH_ACK, c->loc.port, c->rem.port,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m724[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, NULL, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m725[0m[39m:      s->unacked = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m726[0m[39m:      s->acked = s->ack;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m727[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->ttype != MIP_TTYPE_KEEPALIVE[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msettmout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, MIP_TTYPE_KEEPALIVE[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m728[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m729[0m[39m:      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m if not already running, setup a timer to send an ACK later[0m             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m646[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mhandle_tls_recv[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_connection *c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m669[0m[39m:  uint32_t rem_ip;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m670[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&rem_ip, c->rem.ip, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m671[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->flags & TH_FIN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m672[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m If we initiated the closure, we reply with ACK upon receiving FIN[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m673[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m If we didn't initiate it, we reply with FIN as part of the normal TCP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m674[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m closure process[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m675[0m[39m:    uint8_t flags = TH_ACK;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m676[0m[39m:    s->ack = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m677[0m[39m:    s->fin_rcvd = true;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m678[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->is_draining && s->ttype == MIP_TTYPE_FIN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m679[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->seq == [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Simultaneous closure ?[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m680[0m[39m:        s->seq++;                               [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Yes. Increment our SEQ[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m681[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m                                  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Otherwise,[0m                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m689[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m691[0m[39m:           [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[32m""[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m692[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m this is an ACK[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m693[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->fin_rcvd && s->ttype == MIP_TTYPE_FIN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m s->twclosure = true;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m694[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mseq != s->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m695[0m[39m:    uint32_t ack = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m696[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->ack == ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m697[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ignoring duplicate pkt"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m698[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m699[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"SEQ != ACK: %x %x %x"[0m[39m, seq, s->ack, ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m392[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Copy RX payload to TX[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:    icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The heap‐buffer‐overflow occurs in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at the very first access of the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP header byte [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->icmp->type`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, when `pkt->icmp` points to `pkt->pay.buf`, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhich may be at or beyond the end of the allocated buffer.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Upstream dispatch code [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `mg_tcpip_rx` or in the old `rx_ip`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m attempts to [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mguard against truncated ICMP payload by checking `pkt->pay.len < [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` before calling `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. However, in some code [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpaths—particularly nested or patched dispatch branches—this guard is missing or [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbypassed, so `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` can still be invoked with an invalid `pkt->icmp` pointer. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Inside `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, there is no length check before dereferencing `pkt->icmp`,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mso when `pkt->pay.buf`==`raw.buf+raw.len` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi.e., the first byte past the end of the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, reading `type` overruns the allocated region by one byte.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Principles  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Do **not** modify the fuzz harness, test code, or external libraries.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Preserve existing protocol logic and error‐path behavior.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Introduce a minimal local guard in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to ensure we never dereference [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39man out‐of‐bounds ICMP header pointer, regardless of upstream dispatch.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This is a _defense‐in‐depth_ patch: even if upstream code someday changes or [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmisses a check, `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` will remain safe.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Implementation Steps  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   In `src/net_builtin.c`, locate the definition of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m382[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mModify its prologue as follows:  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m --- ADD THIS GUARD ---[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Ensure that pkt->pay.buf points to at least an ICMP header[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m --- END GUARD ---[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Existing logic: safe now to read pkt->icmp->type[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                             [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This one‐line guard ensures that `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` exits early whenever the [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremaining payload length is less than the size of an ICMP header, preventing any [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mOOB access at the `pkt->icmp->type` read.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Safety**: By checking `pkt->pay.len` before any dereference, we close the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mgap that led to a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m‐byte overread.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Simplicity**: A local check in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` avoids complex refactoring of [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader‐stripping logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or the upstream dispatch. It also guarantees [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msafety even if future code changes inadvertently remove or alter upstream guards.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Minimal Impact**: No existing functionality is changed. Legitimate ICMP echo[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrequests [0m[1;39m([0m[33mtype[0m[39m==[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with a full header will still be processed, and replies will be [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mgenerated exactly as before.  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Compliance**: We do not modify harness code, external dependencies, or test [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mscripts. The patch is confined to one function in `net_builtin.c` and will not [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbreak existing tests.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Potential Side Effects & Mitigation  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Behavioral**: Very small or malformed ICMP packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mshorter than [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwill now be silently dropped by `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. In practice, such packets were already[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdiscarding logic upstream, or else they would have caused crashes.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Fuzz‐Test Coverage**: This guard will prevent the crash observed by [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer. We should rerun the fuzzer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`-[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to confirm that no new [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverreads occur.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Code Consistency**: No other protocol handlers require similar fixes, since [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mboth UDP and TCP dispatch check payload lengths before handing off to `[0m[1;35mrx_udp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` or[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mrx_tcp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, and these handlers perform their own bounds‐checked operations.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Verification  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild the code and run the full fuzz suite under ASan with `-[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m`. The [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap‐buffer‐overflow at `net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m` should no longer be reported.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run existing unit and integration tests to ensure no regressions in ICMP [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandling or other protocols.  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Optionally, add a small fuzz testcase with a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte ICMP‐like packet to [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidate that `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` now returns safely without crashing.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/29/25 11:49:27][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=440087;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=232031;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m4[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m[12/29/25 11:51:19][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.ANALYZE -> TeamStatus.[1;33mPATCH[0m                     ]8;id=353083;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=386986;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m4[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m[12/29/25 11:51:39][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.[1;33mPATCH[0m -> TeamStatus.EVALUATE                    ]8;id=474831;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=159672;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Heap left redzone:       fa[0m                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack after return:      f5[0m                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Container overflow:      fc[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
