[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp2hb2kgxu[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA libFuzzer harness triggered an AddressSanitizer heap-buffer-overflow in the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction `rx_icmp` within `src/net_builtin.c`. The overflow occurs when reading the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP header field `type` beyond the allocated packet buffer. To address this, a [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch was applied that:[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Added a length check [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m at the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart of `rx_icmp`.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Changed pointer calculations for ICMP, UDP and TCP headers to use `pkt->pay.buf` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minstead of arithmetic on `pkt->ip` or `pkt->ip6`.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Updated all `mkpay` calls to advance the buffer pointer by the appropriate header[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msize.[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Introduced stricter IPv4 header length validation and recalculated the pay buffer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart accordingly.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter rebuilding and rerunning the fuzzer, the same heap-buffer-overflow in [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m reoccurred, indicating the patch did not eliminate the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout-of-bounds read.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer executes `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`, which allocates a buffer for the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket payload and passes it through the TCP/IP receive path [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_tcpip_rx`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, the code dereferences [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp->type` without a precondition ensuring the ICMP header is entirely [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithin `pkt->pay.buf`.  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- AddressSanitizer reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read overflow at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimmediately past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m0150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m0172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The backtrace shows `rx_icmp` → `mg_tcpip_rx` → `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` → fuzzer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdriver.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `rx_icmp`, insert a guard:  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```c[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- For ICMP, UDP, and TCP in both IPv4 and IPv6 paths, replace header pointer [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomputations:  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  before:  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```c[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  after:  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```c[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.buf;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->pay.buf + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the IPv4 dispatch, consolidate the Internet Header Length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m check:  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```c[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  unsigned ihl = pkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  size_t iphdr_len = ihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + iphdr_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + iphdr_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mResult after patch  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer was rerun with the same command [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`-[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- AddressSanitizer again reports a heap-buffer-overflow in `rx_icmp` at [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow location, allocation size [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, and stack trace are identical [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto the initial report, demonstrating that the new boundary checks and pointer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madjustments did not prevent the out-of-bounds read.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFurther areas to investigate  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The logic that sets and updates `pkt->pay.len` and `pkt->pay.buf` before entering[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp`, including earlier calls to `mkpay`.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The definition and expected layout of `struct pkt`, `struct icmp`, and how [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pay.len` relates to the total packet buffer allocated by the fuzzer harness.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- All code paths that lead into `rx_icmp`, notably the IPv4 path [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip` → [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, to verify correct buffer slicing for fragmented or malformed IP [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheaders.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Similar header parsing in the IPv6 path [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip6` → `rx_icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in case the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow is triggered via an IPv6 test vector.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:    icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:600[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m650[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m600[0m[39m:      eth_h_len + ip_max_h_len + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->is_udp ? udp_h_len : tcp_max_h_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m601[0m[39m:  size_t min_mtu = c->is_udp ? [0m[1;36m68[0m[39m [0m[35m/[0m[39m* RFC-[0m[1;36m791[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m[39m : max_headers_len - eth_h_len;[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m602[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m603[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m If the frame exceeds the available buffer, trim the length[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m604[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlen + max_headers_len > ifp->tx.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m605[0m[39m:    len = ifp->tx.len - max_headers_len;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m606[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m607[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Ensure the MTU isn't lower than the minimum allowed value[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m608[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mtu < min_mtu[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m610[0m[39m:    ifp->mtu = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m min_mtu;[0m                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m808[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m809[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m810[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"UDP %M:%hu -> %M:%hu len %u"[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->src,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m811[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp->sport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->dst,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m812[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp->dport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m813[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_dhcp_client && pkt->udp->dport == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m68[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m814[0m[39m:      pkt->dhcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct dhcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m815[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->dhcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m816[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_client[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m817[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_dhcp_server && pkt->udp->dport == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m67[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m818[0m[39m:      pkt->dhcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct dhcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m819[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->dhcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m820[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_server[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:800[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m806[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m396[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m392[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Copy RX payload to TX[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:    icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Core insight and root cause  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The AddressSanitizer report shows that `rx_icmp` dereferences [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp->type` without verifying that the ICMP header lies fully inside the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated `pkt->raw` buffer.  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Existing guards [0m[1;39m([0m[39mon `pkt->pay.len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m only check payload length past the header,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut do not guarantee the header itself is present; in malformed or truncated [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minputs, `pkt->pay.len` can be large [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdue to pointer‐arithmetic wrap or incorrect [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmkpay arguments[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, allowing `rx_icmp` to be invoked on a non‐existent header.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The correct invariant we need is: before reading any byte of the ICMP header, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mensure that the raw buffer has at least `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` bytes at the header [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocation.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Strategy for patching  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `src/net_builtin.c`, locate the start of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Immediately before the first use of `pkt->icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi.e. before the `if [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` line[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, insert a raw‐based boundary check. This check [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconfirms that the ICMP header pointer is within the `pkt->raw` range and that [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.len` covers `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` bytes from that pointer.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Retain the existing `pkt->pay.len` guard [0m[1;39m([0m[39mit protects the payload‐copy logic[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut make the header‐presence check the authoritative guard for the header itself.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes are needed to the fuzz harness, test code, or external utilities; [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis fix strictly modifies the library’s own parsing logic.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Detailed patch steps  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Open `src/net_builtin.c` around the definition of `rx_icmp`:  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Insert the following boundary check immediately after the debug comment:[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Ensure the ICMP header is fully inside the raw buffer *[0m[35m/[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m              char *hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m              [0m[35m/[0m[39m* hdr must point into raw.buf, and raw.len must extend past hdr + [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader size *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m              if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhdr < pkt->raw.buf ||[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                  hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                  return;  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* truncated or malformed packet – drop silently *[0m[35m/[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m              [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Leave the existing payload check in place:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m              [0m[35m/[0m[39m* … existing reply logic … *[0m[35m/[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. Rebuild and rerun the fuzzer to confirm that the out‐of‐bounds read at [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp:[0m[1;36m385[0m[39m` is eliminated.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This header‐presence guard directly prevents any dereference of [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp->type` unless the ICMP header bytes are actually mapped in the input [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer, closing the ASan‐reported overflow.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - It preserves the existing `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` check, so [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalid echo‐request packets still pass through and generate replies.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All other protocol flows [0m[1;39m([0m[39mUDP, TCP, DHCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m already verify their headers against[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.len` after correctly setting `pkt->udp` or `pkt->tcp` from [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.buf`; no changes are needed there.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We avoid touching harness or test code, adhere strictly to in‐library fixes, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand maintain compatibility with existing fuzzing logic.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Potential side effects and mitigation  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No functional behavior is altered for correctly formed ICMP echo requests; [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39monly truncated or malformed inputs are silently dropped earlier.  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This check is local to `rx_icmp` and does not affect performance noticeably [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mone pointer comparison per ICMP invocation[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We should add a brief comment in the source to explain why the raw‐based guard[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis necessary, avoiding future regressions.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Verification  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rerun existing unit tests [0m[1;39m([0m[39mif any[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that exercise ICMP echo handling on normal [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpackets—those should still pass and reply correctly.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rerun the libFuzzer harness with AddressSanitizer; the previous [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap‐buffer‐overflow at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m should no longer occur across [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m+ runs.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Optionally, add a negative test in the test suite: supply a truncated ICMP [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader and assert no crash or overflow.  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp2hb2kgxu[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA libFuzzer run on the Mongoose codebase triggered an AddressSanitizer report for a[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m-byte heap-buffer overflow inside the function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow occurs when reading the ICMP header at the very end of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer. To guard against out-of-bounds header access, a patch was introduced at the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart of `rx_icmp` that checks whether the ICMP header lies fully within [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.buf` and `pkt->raw.len`, returning early if it does not. Despite this [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madded bounds check, the fuzzer still reproduces the same overflow at the same [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msource location, indicating that the patch did not prevent the invalid memory read.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer invocation allocates a buffer of [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m34[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m for a test [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket and directs it into `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Inside `mg_tcpip_rx`, control passes to `rx_icmp`, which casts a pointer [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m into this [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region.  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The code then reads one byte from `pkt->icmp->type`, but the pointer is exactly [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat the end of the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer, so this [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read overruns the heap allocation [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mby one byte.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The ASan log reports:  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • A read of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at address `[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m172[0m[39m`, which lies [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Stack trace ending in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The patch adds an early boundary check in `rx_icmp`:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Ensure the ICMP header is fully inside the raw buffer *[0m[35m/[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char *hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhdr < pkt->raw.buf ||[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          return;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && [0m[33m...[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[33m...[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This inserted block intends to verify that the ICMP header lies completely within[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m..pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mResult after patch  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Running the same fuzz input again produces the identical AddressSanitizer error [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The heap-buffer-overflow remains a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read past the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer, with the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame backtrace through `rx_icmp`, `mg_tcpip_rx`, and the fuzz harness.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for further investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The computation and assignment of `pkt->icmp`: verify how and where the pointer [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minto `pkt->raw.buf` is derived and whether it accounts for variable IP header [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlengths.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The definitions and sizes of `struct pkt`, `struct ip`, and `struct icmp` to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconfirm that `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` matches the actual header layout.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The value of `pkt->raw.len` relative to the combined lengths of the Ethernet, IP,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand ICMP headers plus payload.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The logic in `mg_tcpip_rx` and surrounding packet-parsing code in net_builtin.c [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto understand how packet fragments and minimal lengths are enforced.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzz harness in `test/fuzz.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m95[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m where the buffer is allocated [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand `pkt->raw.len` is set, in order to see how compact or truncated test inputs [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtrigger this boundary case.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m13[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39merrcode[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m == BSD_EWOULDBLOCK || [0m[1;39m([0m[39merrcode[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m == BSD_EALREADY || \[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m14[0m[39m:   [0m[1;39m([0m[39merrcode[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m == BSD_EINPROGRESS[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m16[0m[39m:#define [0m[1;35mMG_SOCK_RESET[0m[1;39m([0m[39merrcode[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m \[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m17[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39merrcode[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m == BSD_ECONNABORTED || [0m[1;39m([0m[39merrcode[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m == BSD_ECONNRESET[0m[1;39m)[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m18[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m19[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m In blocking mode, which is enabled by default, [0m[1;35maccept[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m waits for a[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m20[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m connection request. In non blocking mode, you must call [0m[1;35maccept[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m21[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m again if the error code BSD_EWOULDBLOCK is returned.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m22[0m[39m:#define [0m[1;35mMG_SOCK_INTR[0m[1;39m([0m[39mfd[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfd == BSD_EWOULDBLOCK[0m[1;39m)[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m23[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m24[0m[39m:#define socklen_t int[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m25[0m[39m:#endif[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m:#if [0m[1;35mdefined[0m[1;39m([0m[39mMG_ENABLE_TCPIP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m && MG_ENABLE_TCPIP[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m:#define MG_EPHEMERAL_PORT_BASE [0m[1;36m32768[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m:#define [0m[1;35mPDIFF[0m[1;39m([0m[39ma, b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mb[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39ma[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                  [2m                [0m
